column5: Sorry Roy, Wolf beat me to it.
Roy, Lumen here in mtl stocks them as well. One location is by the old Pare Lanes (Dec/Jtalon)

I bought a pair a few years ago and there just isn't anything to compare to them. My problem is that I was spoiled by the price that I got them for and now that I want another pair, I can't find them at a reasonable (to me) price. I've been watching Ebay and even there they're going through the roof. Does anyone have a line on where I could get a pair? I don't necessarily need the spring loaded model. If they're that rare it may be best to PM me.  Thanks gang.
I seem to recall a post awhile back Roy where someone said you can now get them at Lowes, and for some reason I think it may have been GBW  Then again, I may be totally wrong
They must be really rare Roy , i can't even find then in the index of the New Fisherman's Encyclopedia ........ lol .
Thanks Lew. I'll follow that up.
They're bolt cutters, Skip.
The Knipex company appears to still be in buiz , i'll nose around at FC Machinery later this morning and see if they can turn some thing up and let you know .
Which # are your's Roy ...... 71-12-200 ?
It WAS Lowes Roy  http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=56450&hl=knipex&st=0
Thanks again Lew.  And yes Skip, it's almost any of these: http://www.knipex.com/index.php?id=1216&L=1&page=group_detail&parentID=1367&groupID=1473
I'll price them and see what we come up with to compare .
correct!  I got mine for $49 @ Lowes
Roy,if you visit Plattsburg every so often Lowes has them in the Plumbing dept
Thanks Geoff. That's what I paid for them a coupla years ago.  Thanks Darren...might be my only option.
Roy, http://theringlord.com they are in alberta.  i only see the spring loaded ones on their site but it might be worthwhile contacting them to see if they carry the others.

It's where I got the original pair, Raf. They're a good place to deal with too! I think it was Lew who gave me the heads up on the Ring Lord back then. My youngest buys a whack of stuff from them and she was able to get a little discount on top of their already fair price.
St. Eustache flee market....$2.oo with a chipped blade,still cuts better than any other cutter .(only saw one pair in 5 years of searching there)
WOW! That's a find of a lifetime! I'd get those BRONZED!
hey Roy, if Lowes no longer sells them you can check Sears.ca http://www.sears.ca/catalog/knipex/100003439
Here is the Ontariop Kijiji search results.    http://ontario.kijiji.ca/f-knipex-Classifieds-W0QQKeywordZknipexQQisSearchFormZtrue
i paid $42 at Lowes Roy. They are readily available in the Electrical section. Right beside all the wire nuts and such.
What model are they Mike?
Lowes carries model 7131200 8-inch lever action mini bolt cutter with notch.
Great and how much are they?
I purchased mine in March for $42.99.
That's excellent...Looks like I'll be picking them up there then. Thanks guys.
